text: Integration erfolgt immer auch über den Arbeitsprozess.
text_en: Integration always occurs through the work process.

text: Für Bestechung von Mitgliedern einer Landes- oder der Bundesregierung muss der Generalbundesanwalt zentral zuständig werden.
text_en: For bribery of members of a state or federal government, the Attorney General must become centrally responsible.

text: Entscheidend hierbei wird unter anderem sein, ob es gelingt durchzusetzen, dass der innerstädtischen Entwicklung zukünftig Vorrang vor dem Bauen auf der grünen Wiese eingeräumt wird.
text_en: Decisive here will be, among other things, whether it succeeds to enforce that the inner-city development will be given priority in the future over building on the green lawn.

text: Hier werden wir weitermachen.
text_en: Here we will continue.

text: Mit ökologischen Ideen lassen sich schwarze Zahlen schreiben.
text_en: With ecological ideas, black numbers can be written.

text: Dies ist eine globale Aufgabe.
text_en: This is a global task.

text: Wir erleben die zunehmende Ausgrenzung eines Teils der Gesellschaft.
text_en: We are witnessing the increasing exclusion of a part of society.

text: Unsere Umwelt ist die gefährdete Grundlage unseres Lebens.
text_en: Our environment is the endangered foundation of our lives.

text: Das Wohlergehen unserer Kinder muss in unserem Blickfeld sein, wenn wir Politik machen:
text_en: The well-being of our children must be in our field of view when we make policy:

text: Es muss klargestellt werden, dass Ärzte, Pädagogen, Sozialarbeiter und Richter nicht zur Denunziation gezwungen werden dürfen.
text_en: It must be clarified that doctors, educators, social workers and judges should not be forced to denounce.

text: In großen Städten wie auch auf dem Land sind öffentliche Kulturräume massiv bedroht – in vielen Dörfern schließen Jugendhäuser und Kinos, in Städten werden Kulturinitiativen von Shopping Malls verdrängt.
text_en: In major cities as well as in the countryside, public cultural spaces are massively threatened - in many villages youth houses and cinemas are closed, in cities cultural initiatives are displaced by shopping malls.

text: Bildung darf nicht eine Frage des Geldbeutels sein.
text_en: Education should not be a matter of the wallet.

text: Wir setzen auf ein durchlässiges Bildungssystem statt auf Selektion und Ausgrenzung, weil es dem Anspruch des Lebenslangen Lernens besser als bisher gerecht wird.
text_en: We rely on a comprehensive education system rather than on selection and exclusion because it meets the demands of lifelong learning better than before.

text: Gleichzeitig wollen wir die Barrieren in den Köpfen der Arbeitgeber und Arbeitgerinnen weiter abbauen:
text_en: At the same time, we want to further remove the barriers in the minds of employers and workers:

text: Wir wollen, dass sich Gewässer naturnah entwickeln können.
text_en: We want water to develop naturally.

text: Immer mehr fürchten den Verlust des Arbeitsplatzes und die, die arbeitslos sind, sehen ihre Chancen schwinden, bald wieder in Beschäftigung zu kommen.
text_en: More and more people are afraid of losing their jobs and those who are unemployed see their chances of returning to work soon diminish.

text: Wir wollen, dass die Vorgaben der EU-Gewässerrahmenrichtlinie von Deutschland endlich zügig erfüllt werden.
text_en: We want Germany to finally fulfill the requirements of the EU Water Framework Directive.

text: Den aktuellen Vorschlägen zur Einführung von Internetsperrlisten und den Aufbau einer umfassenden Sperrinfrastruktur erteilen wir eine klare Absage, da sie rechtsstaatlich und technisch unverantwortlich sind.
text_en: We clearly reject the current proposals for the introduction of Internet blocking lists and the establishment of a comprehensive blocking infrastructure, as they are irresponsible from the point of view of the rule of law and technically.

text: Mit dem grünen Neuen Gesellschaftsvertrag wird endlich Schluss damit gemacht, dass Ökologie, Ökonomie und Soziales gegeneinander ausgespielt werden.
text_en: The Green New Social Compact finally ends with the play of ecology, economy and social matters against each other.

text: Bei vorliegenden Erkenntnissen über drohende Gefährdungen durch Anschläge müssen auch die anderen Atomkraftwerke schnellstmöglich abgeschaltet werden.
text_en: In the event of existing evidence of threats from attacks, the other nuclear power plants must also be shut down as soon as possible.

text: Das muss wieder anders werden.
text_en: It must be different again.

text: Wir wollen erneuerbare Wärme stärker fördern, um die Abhängigkeit von Öl und Erdgas zu verringern.
text_en: We want to strengthen the promotion of renewable heat to reduce dependence on oil and natural gas.

text: Grün steht für eine gestaltete Zuwanderung und ein humanitäres Flüchtlingsrecht.
text_en: Green stands for shaped immigration and a humanitarian right to refugees.

text: Wir wollen dabei auch dem britischen Beispiel folgen und für alle Ministerien eigene Emissionsvorgaben (»Carbon Budgets«) einführen, über deren Einhaltung die verantwortlichen Ministerinnen und Minister Bericht erstatten müssen.
text_en: We also want to follow the British example and introduce carbon budgets for all ministries, which the responsible ministers must report on.

text: Es ist nicht minder skandalös, dass Eltern immer noch um einen Kinderbetreuungsplatz kämpfen müssen, wenn sie einen wollen und brauchen.
text_en: It's no less scandalous that parents still have to fight for a child care place if they want and need one.

text: Dafür wollen wir bewährte Siegel wie Fairtrade, Bio und Ohne Gentechnik stärken.
text_en: To this end, we want to strengthen proven labels such as Fairtrade, Organic and Without Genetic Engineering.

text: Wir wollen die Bevorzugung von Erbschaften und Schenkungen gegenüber anderen Einkünften einschränken, indem wir die Freibeträge wieder auf ein vernünftiges Maß festsetzen und so die Bemessungsgrundlage verbreitern.
text_en: We want to limit the preference of inheritances and gifts over other income by re-establishing the free amounts to a reasonable level and thus expanding the basis for taxation.

text: Die zwangsweise Geschlechtsanpassung intersexueller Menschen muss ein Ende haben.
text_en: The forced gender adaptation of intersex people must end.

text: Mit dem national fokussierten Blick hat Schwarz-Gelb unter dem Deckmantel des Spardiktats in wenigen Monaten über Jahrzehnte aufgebaute Eckpfeiler des Friedensprojekts EU – wie Vertrauen, Solidarität und Einheit in Vielfalt – ins Wanken gebracht.
text_en: With a nationally-focused look, under the cover of the Spardic dictatorship, in a few months over decades, the EU's peace project's cornerstones - such as trust, solidarity and unity in diversity - have been shattered.

text: Tierversuche wollen wir konsequent reduzieren.
text_en: We want to consistently reduce animal testing.

text: Mit einem grünen Klimaschutzhaushalt wollen wir klimaschädliche Subventionen abbauen und so die ökologische Verschuldung verringern.
text_en: With a green climate budget, we want to cut climate-harmful subsidies and thus reduce ecological debt.

text: Die Verhandlungen über die Finanzbeziehungen zwischen Bund, Ländern und Kommunen sind verzwickt.
text_en: The negotiations on the financial relations between the federal, state and municipalities are silent.

text: Das weckt spekulative Begehrlichkeiten und erhöht den Druck auf die Mieterinnen und Mieter.
text_en: This arouses speculative cravings and increases the pressure on tenants.

text: Wir wollen die Folgen des demografischen Wandels nicht dem Schicksal überlassen, sondern das Beste daraus machen: Vom generationengerechten Zusammenleben über die Entwicklung ländlicher Räume bis hin zum Strukturwandel in Großstädten sind Innovationen gefragt, nicht Fatalismus.
text_en: We do not want to leave the consequences of demographic change to the fate, but to make the best out of it: from generational coexistence through rural development to structural changes in big cities, innovation is needed, not fatalism.

text: Statt der derzeit sehr komplexen wollen wir einfachere, aber härtere Regeln.
text_en: Instead of the currently very complex, we want simpler but tougher rules.

text: Während die Große Koalition in den 1960er-Jahren stecken geblieben ist und ihre Verkehrs po litik weiterhin nur auf das Auto ausrichtet, wollen wir in ein neues, zukunftsfähiges und vielfältiges Mobilitätsangebot investieren.
text_en: While the Great Coalition remained stuck in the 1960s and continued to focus its traffic exclusively on the car, we want to invest in a new, sustainable and diverse mobility offer.

text: Ohne das starke Engagement der Bürgerinnen und Bürger, von Kommunen und Vereinen wäre die Aufnahme der vielen Geflüchteten nicht möglich gewesen.
text_en: Without the strong engagement of citizens, municipalities and associations, the reception of the many refugees would not have been possible.

text: Lebenslange Teilhabe ist die Grundlage einer gemeinsamen Kultur.
text_en: Lifelong participation is the foundation of a shared culture.

text: Für eine Politik, die in unsere Infrastruktur und in die Zukunft investiert und gegen ungebremstes Profitstreben auf Kosten des Zusammenhalts.
text_en: For a policy that invests in our infrastructure and in the future and against unhindered profit-seeking at the expense of cohesion.

text: Wir wollen den zielgruppengenauen Einsatz und die entsprechende Finanzierung prüfen.
text_en: We want to examine the target group engagement and the corresponding funding.

text: Zusammen mit der Mehrheit der Bürger*innen und vielen Landwirt*innen wollen wir es nicht akzeptieren, dass gequälte Tiere zusammengepfercht vor sich hin vegetieren und Schmerzen leiden müssen, ohne je die Sonne zu sehen.
text_en: Together with the majority of citizens and many farmers, we do not want to accept the fact that tortured animals have to grow and suffer pain in front of them without ever seeing the sun.

text: Zudem sollen sich Pflegende zehn Tage im Jahr freinehmen können, um sich besonders intensiv um eine zu pflegende Person zu kümmern.
text_en: In addition, caregivers should be allowed to take 10 days a year to take special care of a person to be cared for.

text: Zukunft ist aber nichts, was uns einfach widerfährt.
text_en: The future is not something that just happens to us.

text: Um die offene Gesellschaft, unsere Demokratie und die Menschen zu schützen, müssen wir Terror entschieden bekämpfen – durch effektive intersektional ausgerichtete Präventionsarbeit, bessere Vernetzung der Sicherheitsbehörden und eine konsequente Überwachung von sogenannten Gefährder*innen.
text_en: In order to protect our open society, our democracy and our people, we must resolutely fight terrorism - through effective cross-sectional prevention work, better networking of security authorities and a consistent monitoring of so-called hazards.

text: Unter dem Dach eines eigenständigen europäischen Kartellamts wollen wir deshalb eine europäische Digitalaufsicht etablieren, die als Frühwarnsystem fungiert und sanktionsbewährte Kooperations- sowie Transparenzpflichten aussprechen kann.
text_en: Under the umbrella of an independent European Cartel Office, we therefore want to establish a European digital surveillance system that acts as an early warning system and can impose sanctioned cooperation and transparency obligations.

text: Mit der Istanbul-Konvention haben wir ein Instrument an der Hand, das die notwendigen Maßnahmen beschreibt.
text_en: With the Istanbul Convention, we have an instrument at hand that describes the necessary measures.

text: Im Ergebnis heißt das bis spätestens 2050: kein Müll mehr, Schluss mit geplantem Verschleiß, dafür mehr grüne Jobs vor Ort in einer neuen europäischen Reparatur- und Recyclingindustrie, die die Abhängigkeit von endlichen Ressourcen und Rohstoffimporten verringert.
text_en: As a result, by 2050 no more garbage, no longer planned wear, more green jobs in a new European repair and recycling industry that reduces dependence on finite resources and imports of raw materials.

text: Neue Gaskraftwerke oder Infrastrukturen, die wir für den Kohleausstieg brauchen, darf es deshalb überhaupt nur geben, wenn sie aktuell zwingend notwendig sind und bereits Wasserstoff-ready geplant und gebaut werden.
text_en: Therefore, new gas power plants or infrastructures that we need for the exit of coal should only exist when they are currently absolutely necessary and are already being planned and built hydrogen-ready.

text: Die steuerliche Förderung von Forschung soll künftig gezielter an KMUs und Start-ups fließen, ihre Wirksamkeit wollen wir evaluieren und erhöhen.
text_en: In the future, tax support for research will be more targeted at SMEs and start-ups, and we want to evaluate and increase their effectiveness.

text: Die Kultur- und Kreativwirtschaft ist eine der am meisten unterschätzten Branchen in Deutschland.
text_en: The cultural and creative industries are one of the most underestimated industries in Germany.

text: Um Attentate zu erschweren, werden wir illegalen Waffenhandel, auch und gerade auf Online-Marktplätzen, verstärkt verfolgen.
text_en: In order to make attacks more difficult, we will intensify the monitoring of illegal arms trafficking, especially on online marketplaces.

text: Die Zukunft ist sicherer.
text_en: The future is safer.

text: Der Frieden in Europa ist sicherer geworden.
text_en: Peace in Europe has become safer.

text: Verbot der Verunreinigung der Hohen See u.a. durch Öl.
text_en: It prohibits the pollution of the high seas, including oil.

text: Besserer Arbeitsschutz
text_en: Better occupational protection

text: Die Ausweitung der Planungsrechte der Gemeinden.
text_en: Enlargement of municipal planning rights.

text: Umweltschutz ist in die weltweite Zusammenarbeit, in Raumordnung und Stadtentwicklung einzufügen.
text_en: Environmental protection is to be integrated into global cooperation, spatial planning and urban development.

text: Zu lange ist das Bildungswesen als ein Gebiet angesehen worden, in dem nur Experten etwas zu sagen haben.
text_en: For too long, education has been seen as a field where only experts have something to say.

text: Bildungsurlaub für Betriebsräte.
text_en: Educational leave for employers.

text: Jede Planung gerät unter den Druck von Spekulationsinteressen, weil die Ausweisung einer bestimmten Fläche als Bauland über Nacht zu Wertsteigerungen um das Hundertfache und mehr führen kann.
text_en: Every planning is under the pressure of speculative interests, because the designation of a particular area as a construction land can result in value increases hundreds of times and more overnight.

text: Unsere Bundesrepublik Deutschland hat nach unserem Grundgesetz ein demokratischer und sozialer Bundesstaat zu sein.
text_en: Our Federal Republic of Germany has to be a democratic and social federal state according to our Basic Law.

text: Durch die regionale Strukturpolitik werden die Chancen der Randgebiete und der ländlichen Räume mit geringem Wirtschaftswachstum verbessert und Arbeitsplätze geschaffen.
text_en: Regional structural policy will improve the opportunities of the outermost regions and rural areas with low economic growth and create jobs.

text: Sozialdemokraten gehen davon aus, dass die Balance der militärischen Kräfte zwischen Ost und West für die Sicherung des Friedens grundlegend ist.
text_en: Social Democrats assume that the balance of military forces between East and West is fundamental to securing peace.

text: Freiheit und Demokratie gibt es nur dort, wo freie Meinungsäußerung und freie Lebensentfaltung möglich sind.
text_en: Freedom and democracy exist only where free expression and free development of life are possible.

text: Alle Beteiligten müssen sich zu einer gemeinsamen Anstrengung zusammenfinden.
text_en: All stakeholders must come together in a joint effort.

text: Durch diese Politik der Verträge hat die Bundesrepublik den erfolgreichen Abschluss der Konferenz von Helsinki über Sicherheit und Zusammenarbeit in Europa gefördert.
text_en: Through this policy of treaties, the Federal Republic has contributed to the successful conclusion of the Helsinki Conference on Security and Cooperation in Europe.

text: Dies kann die europäische Einigung gefährden.
text_en: This could jeopardize the European Union.

text: (10) Die Forschungs- und Technologiepolitik sichert den Rang unserer Industrie im internationalen Wettbewerb.
text_en: (10) The research and technology policy ensures the position of our industry in international competition.

text: Deshalb muss dieses Netz auch in Zukunft gesichert und gefestigt werden.
text_en: That is why this network needs to be safeguarded and strengthened in the future.

text: Millionen Menschen nutzen zum Beispiel die flexible Altersgrenze.
text_en: Millions of people, for example, use the flexible age limit.

text: Die Staaten Mitteleuropas und Osteuropas sind nach Geschichte und Tradition Teil Europas.
text_en: The countries of Central and Eastern Europe are part of Europe by history and tradition.

text: Die Sozialdemokratie vertritt gemeinsam mit den Gewerkschaften seit jeher die Interessen der arbeitenden Menschen.
text_en: The social democracy, together with the trade unions, has always represented the interests of the working people.

text: Besonders wichtig ist dabei auch die soziale Absicherung der Landwirte und der in der Landwirtschaft Beschäftigten, wie sie schon in den letzten Jahren unter Aufwendung erheblicher öffentlicher Mittel erfolgreich Betrieben wurde.
text_en: Particularly important is the social security of farmers and those employed in agriculture, which has already been successfully implemented in recent years with considerable public funding.

text: Unsere Aufgabe ist, Sicherheit für Deutschland auch in den 80er Jahren zu bewahren.
text_en: Our task is to preserve security for Germany even in the 1980s.

text: Dabei kommt es auch auf Solidarität zwischen den ölreichen und ölarmen Ländern der Dritten Welt an.
text_en: It also calls for solidarity between the oil-rich and oil-poor countries of the Third World.

text: Wo einzelne und Gruppen diese Chancen aus eigener Kraft nicht nutzen können, haben sie Anspruch auf die Solidarität der Gesellschaft.
text_en: Where individuals and groups cannot take advantage of these opportunities on their own, they are entitled to the solidarity of society.

text: Wir stehen in der Weltenergieversorgung vor schwierigen Problemen.
text_en: We are facing difficult problems in the world's energy supply.

text: Multinationale Ölkonzerne nutzen die Situation im Nahen und Mittleren Osten bei ihrer Preisgestaltung aus.
text_en: Multinational oil companies take advantage of the situation in the Middle East in their pricing.

text: 16 Jahre sozialdemokratische Regierungsbeteiligung, 13 Jahre sozialdemokratische Kanzlerschaft waren eine gute Zeit für unser Land.
text_en: 16 years of social-democratic participation in government, 13 years of social-democratic chancellorhood were a good time for our country.

text: Investitionen in Kenntnisse und Fähigkeiten sind wichtige Zukunftsinvestitionen.
text_en: Investing in knowledge and skills is an important investment in the future.

text: Mit Wachstum allein ist allerdings die Arbeitslosigkeit nicht zu überwinden.
text_en: Growth alone cannot overcome unemployment.

text: Auch in Zukunft wird es Knappheit, Lasten und Pflichten geben.
text_en: There will also be shortages, burdens and duties in the future.

text: Selbstkritisch räumen wir aber auch ein, dass wir nicht immer mit dem nötigen Mut und der erforderlichen Beharrlichkeit am Reformkurs festgehalten haben.
text_en: We also self-critically acknowledge that we have not always held on to the course of reform with the necessary courage and perseverance.

text: Als Grundlage dafür fordern wir die Aufstellung eines Bundesentwicklungsplans, dessen Globalgrößen der öffentlichen Hand als verbindliche Richtlinien und dem privaten Bereich als Orientierungsdaten dienen würden.
text_en: As a basis for this, we demand the preparation of a federal development plan, whose global sizes would serve as binding guidelines for the public and as guidance for the private sector.

text: Die Menschen in der Bundesrepublik und Berlin (West), denen der bessere Teil der deutschen Nachkriegsgeschichte zuteil wird, müssen moralisch und politisch mit den Deutschen in der DDR und Ost-Berlin solidarisch bleiben.
text_en: The people in the Federal Republic and Berlin (West), to whom the better part of German post-war history will be assigned, must remain morally and politically solidary with the Germans in the GDR and East Berlin.

text: Für uns bleibt es dabei, dass die Vereinbarkeit von Beruf und Familie zu den wichtigsten Voraussetzungen von Gleichberechtigung gehört.
text_en: For us, it remains that the compatibility of work and family is one of the most important prerequisites for equality.

text: Wer öffentlich den Völkermord an Juden leugnet und damit verharmlost, darf nicht straflos bleiben.
text_en: Those who publicly deny the genocide of Jews and thereby disgrace them must not remain unpunished.

text: Wir streben auch in Europa eine Energieversorgung ohne Atomkraft an.
text_en: We also strive for a non-nuclear energy supply in Europe.

text: Deshalb müssen wir umsteuern.
text_en: That is why we need to redirect.

text: Tatsächlich sind heute weitaus mehr Menschen ohne Arbeit als bei der Regierungsübernahme durch die gegenwärtige Koalition.
text_en: In fact, far more people are unemployed today than when the current coalition took over the government.

text: Statt einer Umverteilung zugunsten von Spitzenverdienern werden wir gezielt Investitionen in Arbeitsplätze, in Unternehmensneugründungen und Erweiterungen stärken.
text_en: Instead of redistributing to top earners, we will target investment in jobs, start-ups and expansions.

text: Gefahren drohen aus der Massenarbeitslosigkeit und einer Politik der Entsolidarisierung.
text_en: There are risks from mass unemployment and a policy of dissolidarity.

text: Um so beharrlicher werden wir sie verfolgen, ohne die finanzielle Handlungsfähigkeit unseres Gemeinwesens zu gefährden.
text_en: More persistently, we will pursue them without jeopardizing the financial capacity of our community.

text: Sie ist keine Frage schärferer Gesetze oder einer Teilmilitarisierung der Polizei.
text_en: It is not a matter of tighter laws or a partial militarization of the police.

text: Dies gilt vor allem für Arbeitsbeschaffungsmaßnahmen, mit denen wir für bestimmte Gruppen und in strukturschwachen Regionen mehr Beschäftigungs- und Qualifizierungsmassnahmen eröffnen wollen.
text_en: This is especially true of employment procurement measures, with which we aim to open up more employment and qualification measures for certain groups and in structurally weak regions.

text: Unser Staat braucht Bürgerinnen und Bürger mit Zivilcourage.
text_en: Our country needs citizens with civil courage.

text: Oskar Lafontaine und eine sozialdemokratische Bundesregierung stehen dafür.
text_en: Oskar Lafontaine and a Social Democratic Federal Government stand for it.

text: Wir treten für scharfe Umweltnormen nicht nur national, sondern vor allem EG-weit ein.
text_en: We advocate for strict environmental standards not only nationally, but above all across the EU.

text: 38. Wir wollen ökologisch orientierte Investitionen
text_en: We want environmentally oriented investments

text: 5. Im Zentrum unseres Konzepts steht der ökologische Umbau der Industriegesellschaft - ein Feld, das die ""Weiter-so""-Politik der Regierung Kohl sträflich vernachlässigt hat.
text_en: At the heart of our concept is the ecological transformation of the industrial society - a field that has been severely neglected by the Kohl government's "Next-So" policy.

text: Der neue Weg
text_en: The New Way

text: Das Recht auf menschenwürdiges Wohnen gehört zu den sozialen Grundrechten.
text_en: The right to decent housing is one of the fundamental social rights.

text: Allen Warnungen zum Trotz hat die Kohl-Regierung im Alleingang eine Politik durchgepeitscht, in der das vom früheren SED- und Blockparteienregime zu verantwortende Fiasko der DDR-Wirtschaft noch verstärkt wurde.
text_en: In spite of all the warnings, the Kohl government alone has carried out a policy that has reinforced the fiasco of the DDR economy, which was responsible for the former SED and block-party regime.

text: Unser Ziel: Die Vereinigten Staaten von Europa
text_en: Our goal: the United States of Europe

text: Die hohe Qualifikation der Arbeitnehmerinnen und Arbeitnehmer ist im europäischen Wettbewerb ein wichtiger Standortvorteil.
text_en: The high qualification of workers is an important place advantage in European competition.

text: Mit einem mittelfristig angelegten Konsolidierungskonzept wollen wir den dramatischen Anstieg der Staatsverschuldung bremsen, um Investoren und Verbrauchern wieder Vertrauen in die Stabilität der Staatsfinanzen zu geben.
text_en: With a medium-term consolidation approach, we aim to slow the dramatic rise in public debt in order to restore investor and consumer confidence in the stability of public finances.

text: Mit einem öffentlich geförderten Arbeitsmarkt werden wir eine Beschäftigungsbrücke hin zu neuen wettbewerbsfähigen Arbeitsplätzen schaffen.
text_en: With a publicly-funded labour market, we will create a bridge to new, competitive jobs.

text: Dabei werden wir sie unterstützen.
text_en: We will support them.

text: Wir wollen die deutsche Einheit durch einen gerechten Lastenausgleich auf eine tragfähige finanzielle Grundlage stellen.
text_en: We want to put German unity on a sustainable financial basis through a fair balance of burdens.

text: Wir werden Maßnahmen für Mädchen zur Erweiterung des Berufsspektrums und zur Erleichterung beim Übergang von Schule/Ausbildung in den Beruf ergreifen.
text_en: We will take measures for girls to expand the range of careers and to facilitate the transition from school/education to work.

text: Wir wollen deshalb zuverlässige Vereinbarungen zwischen der Bundesregierung und der Automobilwirtschaft.
text_en: We therefore want reliable agreements between the federal government and the automotive industry.

text: In Ostdeutschland bestehen günstige Voraussetzungen für solche Reformen, die Vorbild für andere Bundesländer werden können.
text_en: In East Germany there are favorable conditions for such reforms, which can become a model for other federal states.

text: Ohne Solidarität geht es nicht.
text_en: Without solidarity we cannot.

text: Der am 1. Januar 1995 in Kraft tretende Solidaritätszuschlag der Bundesregierung von 7,5%, der auch die kleinen und mittleren Einkommen belastet, ist Gift für Konjunktur und Arbeitsmarkt.
text_en: The federal government's 7.5% solidarity surcharge, which entered into force on 1 January 1995, is a poison for the economy and the labour market.

text: Unser langfristiges Ziel bleibt die Vollbeschäftigung.
text_en: Our long-term goal is full employment.

text: Sozialdemokratische Angebotspolitik - dazu gehören:
text_en: Social Democratic Supply Policy - this includes:

text: Die Menschen in unserem Land wissen aus ihrem täglichen Leben, dass Veränderungen notwendig sind, um die Chancen der neuen Zeit zu nutzen.
text_en: The people of our country know from their daily lives that changes are necessary to take advantage of the opportunities of the new era.

text: Chancengleichheit in der Bildung
text_en: Equal Opportunities in Education

text: Anderenfalls wird auf gesetzlicher Grundlage ein fairer, bundesweiter Leistungsausgleich zwischen ausbildenden und nicht ausbildenden Betrieben notwendig.
text_en: Otherwise, a fair, nationwide balance of benefits between training and non-training enterprises will be necessary on a legal basis.

text: Bei Zahnersatz für ab 1979 geborene Jugendliche werden wir die abgeschafften Krankenkassenleistungen wieder einführen.
text_en: In the case of dental replacement for young people born after 1979, we will reintroduce the abolished health insurance benefits.

text: Dazu gehört auch die Teilhabe an den neuen Mediendiensten und -techniken.
text_en: This includes participation in new media services and technologies.

text: Wir werden uns stärker auf die Festlegung von ökologischen Zielen und Zeitplänen konzentrieren.
text_en: We will focus more on setting environmental targets and timetables.

text: Unser Leitbild ist eine moderne Teilhabegesellschaft, in der alle ihren gerechten Anteil erhalten am gemeinsam erarbeiteten Wohlstand.
text_en: Our model is a modern shareholding society in which everyone receives a fair share of the wealth created together.

text: Die Investitionen in Bildung und Forschung steigen deutlich.
text_en: Investments in education and research are increasing.

text: Der Reformstau ist aufgelöst.

text_en: For basic foods such as milk and bread, the VAT should therefore be reduced in the same way as for prescribed and therefore necessary medicines for the patient.

text_en: However, a basic insurance for all persons living in Austria, which guarantees financial resources regardless of the individual's willingness to provide services, is rejected by us.

text: Ziel der europäischen Integration muss die Gemeinschaft jener Staaten sein, die geographisch, geistig und kulturell Europa ausmachen und die sich den abendländischen Werten, dem Erbe der Kulturen und den Traditionen der europäischen Völker verpflichtet haben.
text_en: The goal of European integration must be the community of those states that geographically, spiritually and culturally make up Europe and have committed themselves to Western values, to the heritage of cultures and traditions of the European peoples.

text: Ein umfangreicher Ausbau des öffentlichen Verkehrs, die bestmögliche Nutzung heimischer Energiequellen und der Schutz unseres Trinkwassers sowie die Offensive bei der E-Mobilität unter FPÖ-Verkehrsminister Norbert Hofer sind gute Beispiele dafür, dass wir den Umweltgedanken auch wirklich leben.

text_en: We are committed to a holistic approach to preserving our planet and preventing any exclusion of people.

text: Es ist selbstverständlich, dass unsere Vision von wirtschaftlicher und sozialer Gerechtigkeit nur zu verwirklichen ist, wenn die internationalen Handelsbestimmungen umgestaltet und demokratisiert werden.

text: Deshalb treten wir für ein existenzsicherndes Mindesteinkommen ein, dessen Ausgestaltung noch festzulegen ist.

text: Und öffentliche Dienstleistungen dürfen keinesfalls zur Handelsware werden.

text: Alle Steuern, Abgaben und Steuerabzüge, aber auch alle Subventionen und Beiträge sind nicht nur ökonomisch zu bewerten, sondern auch auf ihre Ökologie- und Sozialverträglichkeit hin zu überprüfen.

text: ПКЕКОГЛАСНОСТ; като наследник на първите независими екологични организации, у нас ще съумее да съчетае целите за защита на природата с идеите за нейното регулирано възпроизводство и принципа за взаимообвързването на екологията с културата, икономиката, политиката и всяка обществена дейност.
text_en: As the successor of the first independent environmental organizations, we will be able to combine the objectives of nature protection with the ideas of its regulated reproduction and the principle of interconnecting ecology with culture, economy, politics and every social activity.

text: Повишаване на самостоятелността на районите в големите градове, повишаване приходите за общините, районите и кметствата чрез местни такси и стопанска инициативност.
text_en: Increase the autonomy of districts in large cities, increase the revenue for municipalities, districts and municipalities through local taxes and business initiative.

text: Ще търсим широка база на управлението, не само спрямо парламентарните сили, а и спрямо извънпарламентарните формации и структурите на гражданското общество.
text_en: We will seek a broad base of governance, not only with regard to parliamentary forces, but also with regard to non-parliamentary formations and civil society structures.

text: Хиляди хора се записват за членове, всеки ден се регистрира нова местна структура.
text_en: Thousands of people sign up for membership, a new local structure is registered every day.

text: РЗС показа, че е единствената политическа сила, която реално разобличава корупцията и връзките с мафията по високите етажи на властта.
text_en: The RPS has shown that it is the only political force that really exposes corruption and ties to the mafia at the high levels of power.

text: Подвластна е на шепа фактори от бившата ДС, ангажирани и корумпирани с участието си в управлението на България през всичките години на прехода.
text_en: It was dominated by a handful of factors from the former GC, engaged and corrupted by their participation in the governance of Bulgaria during all the years of the transition.

text: Вече 20 години България е на едно от последните места в Европа по жизнен стандарт.
text_en: For 20 years, Bulgaria has been one of the last places in Europe in terms of living standards.

text: Тя не допуска в нея да влязат квалифицирани политици-експерти, способни да генерират нови идеи и да лансират в обществото професионално обосновани тези.
text_en: It prevents qualified policy experts from entering it, capable of generating new ideas and launching professionally-founded ones into society.

text: Тя няма капацитет да излъчва адекватни на новите реалности политици и държавници.
text_en: It has no capacity to broadcast adequate to the new realities politicians and statesmen.

text: Най-важното е, че постигаме реални резултати.
text_en: The most important thing is to get real results.

text: Гости на нашия конгрес са официални представители на тези партии, високоуважавани политици и искрени приятели на нашата страна.
text_en: Guests to our congress are official representatives of these parties, highly respected politicians and sincere friends of our country.

text: Подкрепа на местните инициативи за осигуряване на проектна готовност и изграждане/реконструкция на корекции на речните корита и дерета, укрепване на бреговете на реки в населените места; Подкрепа на местните инициативи за осигуряване на проектна готовност и благоустрояване на улиците и на техните съоръжения;
text_en: Support for local initiatives to ensure project readiness and construction/reconstruction of adjustments to river courses and rivers, strengthening the banks of rivers in settlements; Support for local initiatives to ensure project readiness and well-design of streets and their facilities;

text: Единен регистър на всички иновативни компании / проекти / идеи / разработки и напасването им с програми за кандидатстване директно в Брюксел.
text_en: A single register of all innovative companies/projects/ideas/developments and matching them with application programs directly in Brussels.

text: Нарастване на заплащането на работещите в сектора; Реформиране на БАН и увеличаване на държавната субсидия; Промяна на системата на финансиране с цел по-висока ефективност; Демократичен избор на директорите - пряко участие на педагогическите съвети при избора на нов директор съвместно с МОН / Инспекторатите, след представяне на програмата за управление.
text_en: Increasing the salary of those working in the sector; Reforming the BAN and increasing the state subsidy; Changing the funding system for greater efficiency; Democratic selection of directors - direct participation of the pedagogical boards in the election of a new director jointly with the MON / Inspectorates, after the presentation of the management program.

text: Осигуряване на частично или пълно покриване на таксите на деца до 16 годишна възраст за занимания по избор.
text_en: Providing partial or full coverage of fees for children up to 16 years of age for elective activities.

text: Социална политика
text_en: Social policy

text: Регулиране на размера на съдебните такси за да не се ограничава достъпът на обикновенния човек до правосъдие
text_en: Regulation of the amount of court fees so as not to restrict the access of ordinary persons to justice

text: Създаване на условия за активно развитие на туристическия потенциал на страната, основан на нейните човешки, природни и антропогенни ресурси;
text_en: Creating conditions for the active development of the tourism potential of the country, based on its human, natural and anthropogenic resources;

text: Държавна подкрепа за проектирането, договорирането и изграждането на водните цикли на общините, финансирано от средства на ЕС;
text_en: State support for the design, negotiation and construction of municipal water cycles, funded by EU funds;

text: Създаване на специализиран екип, който инициира и въвежда в практиката проекти, свързани с артистичните и креативни индустрии, и с артистичните и креативни умения на младите, които искат да се реализират в друга сфера, независимо от избора им на професия; Създаване на център за талантливи деца (в частност - с дислексия), и специализирани учебни и извънкласни програми/ паралелки за тях; Създаване на ""Министерство на Иновациите"", което изготвя стратегия и тактика на база на бъдещите световни тенденции (10+ години), и което започва от сега подготовката на процеси, хора, умения, експериментални разработки, пилотни проекти, чрез които ще се гарантира дългосрочното оцеляване на България (напр. подготвени ли са хората за момента, в който автомобилите ще са безпилотни и няма да има нужда от шофьори, или какво ще работят хората, чиито професии могат и ще бъдат заменени от роботи?
text_en: Creation of a specialized team that initiates and implements projects related to the artistic and creative industries, and the artistic and creative skills of young people who want to realize themselves in another sphere, regardless of their choice of profession; Creation of a center for talented children (in particular - with dyslexia), and specialized educational and extra-class programs/ parallels for them; Creation of the "Ministry of Innovations" which drafts strategy and tactics based on future world trends (10+ years), and which starts from now on the preparation of processes, people, skills, experimental developments, pilot projects through which will ensure the long-term survival of Bulgaria (e.g. are people prepared for the moment when cars will be inexperienced and there will be no need for drivers, or what people will work, whose professions will be and can be

text: Програма за преодоляване на демографския срив сред българите.
text_en: A program to overcome the demographic decline among Bulgarians.

text: 20 принципа на Национален съюз АТАКА:
text_en: 20 Principles of National Union Attack:

text: Разследване на криминално забогателите и всички сделки с участие на политици, както и сделките по външния дълг.
text_en: Investigate the criminally wealthy and all transactions involving politicians, as well as foreign debt transactions.

text: Генерален прочит на бюджетната схема и преразпределението на бюджета в полза на българските граждани, а не на управленската върхушка.
text_en: A general reading of the budget scheme and the redistribution of the budget for the benefit of the Bulgarian citizens, not the governance.

text: Пълен неутралитет.
text_en: Total neutrality.

text: Законово въвеждане на минимална цена на труда - почасово заплащане, отговарящо на средноевропейското.
text_en: Legal introduction of a minimum cost of labour - hourly wage corresponding to the European average.

text: Те стоят над влизането в политически, военни или други международни съюзи.
text_en: They stand above entering political, military or other international alliances.

text: Българският бизнес, независимо държавен или частен, се подпомага от държавата във и извън границите й.
text_en: Bulgarian business, whether public or private, is supported by the state within and outside its borders.

text: Всеки български инвеститор, предприемач и производител е с предимство пред всеки чуждестранен до изравняването на стандарта ни на живот със средноевропейския.
text_en: Every Bulgarian investor, entrepreneur and producer has an advantage over any foreign until our standard of living is equal to the European average.

text: Нужно е още:
text_en: We need more:

text: Като данъчна философия АТАКА е за намаляване на данъците на по-бедните за сметка на данъците, вземани от по-богатите.
text_en: As a tax philosophy, Attack is about reducing the taxes of the poor at the expense of the taxes collected by the rich.

text: Българският народ преживя този удар на неолибарелния капитализъм и не може да понесе повече удари.
text_en: The Bulgarian people have survived this blow of neoliberal capitalism and cannot endure any more strikes.

text: Истерично приватизиране на основните национални активи на България, което не доведе до по-добре работеща икономика, до повече износ, до по-добър стандарт на българското население.
text_en: Hysterical privatization of the main national assets of Bulgaria, which did not lead to a better functioning economy, to more exports, to a better standard of the Bulgarian population.

text: Пълна ревизия на връщането на земите на техните истински собственици или техните наследници.
text_en: Complete revision of the return of land to their true owners or their heirs.

text: Точно и ясно конкретизиране на изискуемата база данни.
text_en: Exact and precise specification of the required database.

text: , предвидима система на икономиката, с превес на реалната
text_en: the predictable system of the economy, with the preponderance of the real

text: Имаме нужда от нова икономическа философия и тя е антиглобалистка, антинеолиберална, антиспекулативна.
text_en: We need a new economic philosophy, and it is anti-globalistic, anti-neoliberal, anti-speculative.

text: С едно съкращаване на паразитни държавни структури могат да се освободят до около 2-3 милиарда лева годишно, които заедно с т. нар. излишъци и с парите, блокирани в резерв биха могли да увеличат двойно най-ниските и средните пенсии незабавно.
text_en: With a reduction of parasitic state structures can be released up to about 2-3 billion lei per year, which together with so-called surpluses and the money locked in the reserve could double the lowest and average pensions immediately.

text: Това можеше да е оборотът на българския МДК - Пирдоп, ако не беше продаден за стотинки.
text_en: This could have been the turnover of the Bulgarian MDC-Pirdop if it had not been sold for pennies.

text: Това са: италианската Уникредит Булбанк - с активи от 11,9 млрд. лв., унгарската ДСК - с активи от 8,6 млрд. лв., гръцката ""Пиреос"" с активи от 3,2 млрд лв., австрийската ""Райфайзен"" с активи 6,45 млрд лв., френската ""Сосиете Женерал"" с активи от 3,29 млрд. лв., държавната гръцка ОББ - с активи от 6,7 млрд лв., турската Търговска банка

text: Незабавното приемане на посочените промени в Закона за съдебната власт разглеждаме като крачка в посоката на извършването на цялостна промяна на модела, по който магистратите се избират и израстват в кариерата.
text_en: We see the immediate adoption of the aforementioned changes to the Judicial Law as a step in the direction of carrying out a comprehensive change in the model by which magistrates are elected and grow in their careers.

text: Независимо от ръста на работните места в обществения сектор с 6,2% намалява броят на съществуващите и новооткритите работните места.
text_en: Despite the growth of public sector jobs by 6.2%, the number of existing and new jobs decreased.

text: Възможно е допълнително финансиране на проектен принцип в публично-частното партньорство и засилване на научноизследователската дейност.
text_en: Additional project-based funding in public-private partnerships and strengthening of research activities are possible.

text: Понастоящем в България функционира само 1 завод за термално изгаряне на сметта, близо до София, който захранва с електричество 2500 домакинства.
text_en: Currently, there is only one thermal combustion plant in Bulgaria, near Sofia, which supplies electricity to 2,500 households.

text_en: Welcome to the Bulgarian manufacturer!

text_en: From "Hemus" were built only 34%, from "Struma" - 12%, from "Marica" - 36%, and from "Black Sea" - only 9%.

text: За техните пионки в лицето на управляващата партия и политическите елити, които са управлявали дотук.
text_en: For their pioneers in the face of the ruling party and the political elites that have ruled so far.

text: У нас минималната пенсия е 145 лева /74 евро/, в Германия - 1800 лева /900 евро/.
text_en: In Germany, the minimum pension is €145 (€74), and in Germany, €1800 (€900).

text: Само в България корумпираният и национално безотговорен управляващ елит пак е извън времето и пространството.
text_en: Only in Bulgaria is the corrupt and nationally irresponsible ruling elite beyond time and space.

text: Говорят за връщане на националната идентичност в икономиката.
text_en: They are talking about the return of national identity to the economy.

text: Пазарният фундаментализъм, превърнат в религия от финансовата и политическа върхушка на САЩ претърпя тотален крах.
text_en: Market fundamentalism, transformed into a religion by the financial and political supremacy of the United States, has suffered a total collapse.

text: Към това трябва да прибавим досегашното й положение на колонизирана държава.
text_en: To this we must add its previous status as a colonial state.

text: Разликата между българската цена на труда и останалите в ЕС е средно 8.7 пъти по-ниска от тази в евросъюза.
text_en: The difference between Bulgarian labor costs and the rest of the EU is on average 8.7 times lower than that in the European Union.

text: Франсис Фукуяма, апологет на капиталистическия фундаментализъм, който написа ""Краят на историята"", заяви необходимост от ""засилване на националните държави"".
text_en: Francis Fukuyama, the apologist of capitalist fundamentalism, who wrote "The End of History," stated the need for "the strengthening of national states."

text: Навън изтичат печалбите от електрическия ток, от супермаркетите и моловете, от минералните ни води и мобилните оператори.
text_en: Profits from electricity, supermarkets and malls, our mineral waters and mobile operators are leaking out.

text: Usprkos velikog broja zakona i propisa institucionalnog sistema za zaštitu okoliša, uništavanje i propadanje našeg životnog ambijenta zbiva se pred našim očima izazivajući prosvjed ekološki svjesne javnosti i nužnost zajedničkog organiziranog ekološkog djelovanja građana i skupina na lokalnoj, regionalnoj i republičkoj razini.
text_en: Despite the large number of laws and regulations of the institutional environmental protection system, the destruction and degradation of our living environment is happening before our eyes, provoking the protest of an ecologically conscious public and the need for joint organized ecological action of citizens and groups at the local, regional and republican levels.

text: Politika i vlast nisu primarni ciljevi već jedno od mogućih sredstava djelovanja zelenih.
text_en: Politics and power are not the primary objectives but one of the possible means of action of the Greens.

text: sudjelovanje u redizajnu postojeće i izradi nove, cjelovite i djelotvorne, ekološke legislative,_.
text_en: participation in the redesign of existing and the preparation of new, comprehensive and effective, environmental legislative,_.

text: Vrijednosna orijentacija zelenih
text_en: Value orientation of green

text: osiguranje stručne interpretacije podataka o stanju prirodnih izvora, životnog, prirodnog i urbanog okoliša,
text_en: providing expert interpretation of data on the state of natural resources, living, natural and urban environment,

text: Savez zelenih Hrvatske (dalje: SZH) je organizacija koja okuplja lokalne ekološke organizacije, stručna društva, na ekološkim programima te pojedine zainteresirane za očuvanje kvalitete i poboljšanje stanja prirodnog okoliša, prirodnih izvora i kulturne baštine, kao i za stvaranje društvene i političke klime koja omogućuje izgradnju opredjeljivanja o ekološki održivom razvoju, ostvarivanje ljudskog prava na zdrav okoliš i afirmaciju svijesti o odgovornosti sadašnjih generacija za ekološku sigurnost budućih naraštaja.
text_en: The Alliance of Greens of Croatia (hereinafter: SZH) is an organization that brings together local ecological organizations, professional societies, on ecological programs and individuals interested in preserving the quality and improvement of the state of the natural environment, natural resources and cultural heritage, as well as for creating a social and political climate that enables building determination on ecologically sustainable development, realization of the human right to a healthy environment and affirmation of awareness of the responsibility of present generations for ecological security of future generations.

text: posredovanje u širenju svih ekološki relevantnih informacija od izvora do institucija (uprave, obrazovnih ustanova, komunalnih službi...) i građana, odnosno organizacija, i obrnuto,
text_en: mediating in the dissemination of all environmentally relevant information from sources to institutions (administration, educational institutions, municipal services...) and citizens, respectively organizations, and vice versa,

text: ADRESA: Zagreb, Vlaška 70, tel. 041/410-266
text_en: Address: Zagreb, Vlaška 70, tel. 041/410-266

text: Osnovni cilj SZH je formuliranje zajedničkih ekoloških interesa i povezivanje subjekata koji te interese prepoznaju kao svoje, te djelovanje radi javne promocije i ostvarivanja ovih interesa.
text_en: The basic objective of SZH is to formulate common ecological interests and to connect entities that recognize these interests as their own, and to act for public promotion and realization of these interests.

text: Oštro se suprotstavljamo voluntarističkim aspiracijama i planovima o gradnji nuklearne i termoelektrana na Jadranu.
text_en: We strongly oppose voluntary aspirations and plans for the construction of nuclear and thermal power plants in the Adriatic Sea.

text: Zato hitno rješavanje najtežih problema okolice mora postati kamen kušnje za općinske vlade Splita, Kaštela i Solina, te republičke i savezne vlade, osnovni kriterij ocjene uspješnosti njihova rada.
text_en: Therefore, the urgent resolution of the most difficult problems of the surrounding area must become a test stone for the municipal governments of Split, Kastel and Solin, as well as the republican and federal governments, the basic criterion for evaluating the success of their work.

text: Zahtijevamo skupštinske ocjene dosadašnjeg rada općinskog i okružnog javnog tužilaštva, te sanitarnih, zdravstvenih vodopri- vrednih i drugih inspektora i smjenjivanje onih koji dosadašnjim radom nisu pokazali spremnost na poštivanje važećih propisa.
text_en: We demand assembly assessments of the previous work of the municipal and district public prosecutors, as well as sanitary, sanitary and other inspectors, and the replacement of those who have not shown their readiness to comply with applicable regulations.

text: Zalažemo se za ekološki primjerenu ekonomiju koja je spremna degradacijski model razvoja Splita i okolice zamijeniti takvim koji će se temeljiti na znanju, reciklaži čistim tehnologijama, ekološki vrednovanom tržištu, očuvanju prirodnih izvora, zaštiti prirodnog i kulturnog identiteta grada i regije.
text_en: We advocate for an ecologically appropriate economy that is ready to replace the degrading development model of Split and its surroundings with one that will be based on knowledge, recycling clean technologies, an ecologically valued market, conservation of natural resources, protection of the natural and cultural identity of the city and the region.

text: Onečišćenost zraka, mora i tla već prijeti i budućim generacijama.
text_en: Air, sea and soil pollution already threatens future generations.

text: Izborni program
text_en: Electoral Program

text: Industrija koja radnike i njihovo potomstvo pretvara u invalide mora biti zaustavljena.
text_en: The industry that turns workers and their offspring into disabled must be stopped.

text: Hoćemo smanjenje i kontroliranje emisija svih zagađivača mora, zraka, voda i tla Kaštelanskog zaljeva i solinsko-kaštelansko-split- skog industrijskog bazena i priobalnog mora.
text_en: We want to reduce and control emissions of all pollutants of the sea, air, water and soil of the Kaštelan Bay and the salt-castel-split industrial basin and coastal sea.

text: Čisto more, zrak i tlo u integralnoj Europi bit će splitska ulaznica za Europu.
text_en: Clean sea, air and land in an integrated Europe will be a split ticket for Europe.

text: Domovina Hrvatska u prostornom, nacionalnom i kulturnom smislu temeljna je vrijednost njenog djelovanja.

text: Aplicarea cercetării științifice in domeniul ecologic si proiectarea de tehnologii nepoluantej.
text_en: Application of scientific research in the environmental field and design of clean technologies.

text: Libertatea țăranilor de a se asocia pentru, efectuarea in comun a lucrărilor mecanizate in scopul rentabilizării aoti- vitâtii pe baze economice si ecologice specifice terenurilor respective.
text_en: The freedom of peasants to associate for the joint execution of mechanized work for the purpose of making profitable others on the economic and ecological bases specific to the land concerned.

text: Restructurarea unităților productive după principiul rentabilității si trecerea la o economie de piață.
text_en: Restructuring production units according to the principle of profitability and the transition to a market economy.

text: Partidul Ecologist Român isi propune sâ unească in rindurile sale toti oamenii de buna credința din aceasta tara
text_en: The Romanian Ecologist Party aims to unite in its ranks all people of good faith in this country.

text: Refacerea zonelor afectate datorita activităților umane, pfin reconstrucție ecologioă (impăduriri desalinizare, si combaterea eroziunii solului neutralizarea sau Înlăturarea rezidurilor poluante copertarea ai Împădurirea haldelor de steril repopulări cu animale modificarea ecologică a vegetației refacerea ecosistemelor distruse sau amenințate cu distrugerea)

text: Acordarea unei suprafeţe de 5 ha teren şi 1 ha pădure pentru toate parohiile şi mănăstirile ortodoxe din România.
text_en: Providing an area of 5 ha of land and 1 ha of forest for all parishes and monasteries in Romania.

text: Acest obiectiv se va realiza la nivel naţional şi local după cum urmează:La nivel naţional, prin constituirea unui Fond de Risc în cadrul Bugetului de stat ca să reprezinte cel puţin 1% din nivelul acestuia.
text_en: This objective will be achieved at the national and local level as follows: At the national level, by establishing a Risk Fund within the State Budget to represent at least 1% of its level.

text: Fondul de Risc constitui la nivel naţional va fi transferat la nivel judeţean, proporţional cu populaţia judeţelor.
text_en: The national risk fund will be transferred to the county level, in proportion to the county population.

text: Nivelul pensiilor va reprezenta 75% din salariul net realizat.
text_en: Pensions will make up 75% of net earnings.

text: Preluarea la datoria publică a creditelor şi dobânzilor restante până la 01.01.1995 de la toţi agenţii economici din agricultură şi industria alimentară, indiferent de forma de proprietate.
text_en: Take over the public debt of the loans and interests outstanding until 01.01.1995 from all economic agents in agriculture and food industry, regardless of the form of ownership.

text: Concediul prenatal, plătit integral, de trei luni de zile şi concediul postnatal, de trei ani de zile, plătit integral pentru tinerele şi femeile care dau viaţă copiilor României.
text_en: Pre-natal leave, paid in full, of three months and postnatal leave, of three years, paid in full for young women and women who give life to Romanian children.

text: Alocarea unui buget anual special de 500 miliarde lei destinat exclusiv construirii de locuinţe pentru militari şi familiile lor.
text_en: Allocate a special annual budget of 500 billion lei exclusively for the construction of housing for military personnel and their families.

text: Tinerii şi familiile tinere vor achita doar 10% din valoarea locuinţei la cumpărare.
text_en: Young people and young families will only pay 10% of the value of the home at the purchase.

text: Scutirea totală de impozit a agenţilor economici care îşi reinvestesc profitul.
text_en: Total tax exemption for economic agents who reinvest their profits.

text: Totodată, vom sprijini dezvoltarea industriei casnice și a meșteșugurilor la sate.
text_en: At the same time, we will support the development of household industry and crafts in the villages.

text: PROJECT DE STATUT
text_en: Draft of Statute

text: Art. 20 - Consiliul Coordonator al Partidului România Mare alcătuit din 17 membri se alege la Congres și are următoarele atribuțiuni:
text_en: The Coordinating Council of the Party of Greater Romania, composed of 17 members, is elected by Congress and has the following powers:

text: Partidul România Mare acordă o deosebită atenție păstrării echilibrului ecologic, combaterii poluării mediului și apelor de către marile și micile combinate industriale și zootehnice, refacerii fertilității terenurilor degradate.
text_en: The party pays special attention to preserving the ecological balance, combating environmental and water pollution by large and small industrial and zootechnical combinations, restoring the fertility of degraded land.

text: Congresul Partidului România Mare se convoacă din 4 în 4 ani, de către Comitetul Director.
text_en: The Congress of the Party of Greater Romania is convened every four years by the Director Committee.

text: Tranziția la economia de piață se va asigura cu costuri sociale cît mai mici, fără șocurile care afectează în prezent categoriile productive ale societății.
text_en: The transition to a market economy will be achieved with as low social costs as possible, without the shocks that currently affect the productive categories of society.

text: Organul de presă al partidului este șuplimentul politic al. Revistei România Mare.
text_en: The party's press organ is the political supplement of Romania Mare Magazine.

text: în colaborare cu o serie de colective de specialiști - sociologi, psihologi, medici, economiști - partidul nostru va elabora și va transpune în viață, încă din acest an, 1991, trei Programe Naționale de ajutorare
text_en: In collaboration with a number of collectives of specialists - sociologists, psychologists, doctors, economists - our party will develop and implement, as of this year, 1991, three National Aid Programmes.

text: confesionale, între diferite categorii sociale și profesionale, între generații, se scot la suprafață teze dușmănoase cu pretenții teritoriale, urmărindu-se pas cu pas, printr- un întreg arsenal de mijloace, dezmembrarea' României.
text_en: Between different social and professional categories, between generations, hostile theses with territorial claims are being brought to the surface, and step by step, through a whole arsenal of means, the dismemberment of Romania is sought.

text: Pe de altă parte, agricultura românească poate furniza materia primă necesară industriei alimentare, industriei ușoare și altor ramuri, produse vegetale și animale, mai ales cele prelucrate industrial, ocupând și în trecut o pondere mare în exportul Țării, cu importante încasări valutare.
text_en: On the other hand, Romanian agriculture can supply the raw material needed for the food industry, light industry and other branches, plant and animal products, especially those processed industrially, occupying a large share in the country's exports, with important foreign exchange receipts.

text: În cadrul acestor forme de exploatare agricolă (practicată și în Țări occidentale), țăranii rămân proprietari ai terenului cu care au intrat în asociație.
text_en: Within these forms of agricultural exploitation (practiced also in Western Countries), the peasants remain owners of the land with which they have entered into association.

text: Suprafețele mari pe care se puteau executa în mod mecanizat toate lucrările au fost divizate în cca 44milioane de parcele lucrate, în cea mai mare parte, după deprinderile încetățenit în secolul XIX-lea.
text_en: The large areas on which all the work could be carried out mechanically were divided into approximately 44 million plots, mostly after habits ceased in the 19th century.

text: Pornind de la actualele realități, P.R.M. consideră că numai o agricultură avansată poate și trebuie să redreseze situația economică de ansamblu a Țării.
text_en: Based on the current realities, P.R.M. believes that only advanced agriculture can and must restore the overall economic situation of the country.

text: În felul acesta industria de mobilă, de textile, o bună parte din industria sticlăriei, au intrat în mâna unor mercenari.
text_en: In this way, the furniture and textile industry, a large part of the glass industry, went into the hands of mercenaries.

text: Tot ei și-au permis să ne numească extremiști.
text_en: They call us extremists.

text: România nu are voie să fie o Țară săracă, ea e binecuvântată de Dumnezeu cu bogății naturale.
text_en: Romania is not allowed to be a poor country, it is blessed by God with natural wealth.

text: Asociația se poate ocupa și de valorificarea surplusului de produse agricole - inclusiv de exportul acestora; societățile agricole publice (cu capital majoritar de stat) vor rămâne o anumită perioadă principalele furnizoare de produse agroalimentare necesare orașului; ele trebuie să beneficieze de mijloace tehnice necesare, de credite ieftine și mai ales de manageri pricepuți, angajați pe baza de concurs și prin contract; exploatarea unei anumite suprafețe în sistemul arendei trebuie încurajată mai ales prin sistemul de credite și impozite.
text_en: The association can also deal with the exploitation of the surplus of agricultural products - including their exports; public agricultural companies (with majority state capital) will remain for a certain period of time the main suppliers of the necessary agro-food products to the city; they must benefit from the necessary technical means, cheap credits and especially skilled managers, employed on the basis of competition and by contract; the exploitation of a certain area in the lease system must be encouraged primarily through the credit and tax system.

text: A doua dimensiune a politicii noastre este social-economică.
text_en: The second dimension of our policy is socio-economic.

text: Înlăturarea aberaţiei impozitării pensiilor, dublarea pensiilor mici şi majorarea burselor studenţeşti până la dublarea acestora.
text_en: Eliminate the aberration of taxation of pensions, double small pensions and increase student scholarships to double them.

text: Reducerea severă a numărului de biruri, taxe şi impozite plătite de populaţie şi micşorarea cotei TVA, în special la produsele alimentare şi la medicamente.
text_en: A sharp reduction in the number of offices, taxes and taxes paid by the population and a reduction in the rate of VAT, especially on food and medicines.

text: Programe complexe, ferme, de protecţie a tinerilor, cuprinzând garantarea dreptului la învăţătură şi a gratuității învăţământului de stat, a dreptului la muncă potrivit competenţelor individuale, dreptului la recreere, măsuri de sprijinire de către stat a tinerelor familii, prin alocarea de locuinţe sociale, și, după caz, prin acordarea de credite subvenţionate în vederea dobândirii unei locuinţe şi a bunurilor de folosinţă îndelungată necesare în gospodărie.
text_en: Complex, robust programmes of protection of young people, including the guarantee of the right to education and the free of charge of state education, the right to work according to individual competences, the right to recreation, measures of state support to young families, by allocation of social housing, and, where appropriate, by granting subsidized loans in order to acquire a home and long-lasting goods necessary in the household.

text: Elaborarea unui Pact politic şi special pentru realizarea unei strategii sănătoase de relansare a economiei naţionale.
text_en: Developing a political and special Pact for the realization of a healthy strategy for the revival of the national economy.

text: Trimiterea în instanţă şi judecarea, în procese publice, a celor care se fac vinovaţi de genocidul practicat împotriva Poporului Român, precum şi pedepsirea lor în temeiul legilor existente, în paralel cu efectuarea demersurilor necesare pentru repatrierea celor circa 4 miliarde de dolari depuşi, în bănci străine, în ultimii 4 ani.
text_en: To bring those who are guilty of the genocide committed against the Romanian people to court and to prosecute them in public trials, as well as to punish them under existing laws, in parallel with taking the necessary steps to repatriate the approximately $4 billion deposited in foreign banks over the past 4 years.

text: Instaurarea Dictaturii Legii şi la nevoie, instituirea temporară a stării de necesitate, eventual pe o perioadă de 6 luni, pentru oprirea anarhiei, a dezastrului şi a căderii Ţării în haos.
text_en: The establishment of the dictatorship of the law and, if necessary, the temporary establishment of the state of necessity, possibly for a period of six months, to stop the anarchy, disaster and the fall of the country into chaos.

text: Reducerea decalajelor de dezvoltare existente faţă de Ţările U.E. în domeniul comunicaţiilor şi al tehnologiei informaţiei.
text_en: Reduce existing development gaps with EU countries in the field of communications and information technology.

text: Eradicarea mizeriei crunte de la sate; refacerea şi înflorirea agriculturii româneşti printr-un program de amploare naţionala susţinut prin subvenţii de la Bugetul de Stat; acordarea de credite pe termen lung cu dobândă subvenţionată; captarea cu maşini şi tehnică performantă a exploataţiilor agricole; stimularea creşterii animalelor şi a păsărilor (inclusiv revigorarea marilor combinate zootehnice); refacerea şi extinderea sistemelor de irigaţii.
text_en: Eradicating the cruel misery in the villages; restoring and flourishing Romanian agriculture through a national-scale program supported by subsidies from the State Budget; granting long-term loans with subsidized interest; capturing with machinery and efficient technology of farms; stimulating the breeding of livestock and poultry (including revitalization of large combined zootechnics); rebuilding and expanding irrigation systems.

text: Renegocierea acordurilor cu FMI şi Banca Mondială, de pe poziţia de protejare a intereselor pe termen lung ale României; în eventualitatea că nu se vor obţine condiţii mai bune, se va renunţa, temporar, la aceste acorduri înrobitoare şi se va trece la identificarea altor surse de finanţare externă.
text_en: Renegotiation of agreements with the IMF and the World Bank, from the position of protecting Romania's long-term interests; in the event that better conditions are not obtained, these enslaving agreements will be temporarily abandoned and other sources of external financing will be identified.

text: Redresarea agriculturii si zootehniei prin subvenționare de către stat;
text_en: Recovery of agriculture and livestock production through state subsidies;

text: Construcția de locuințe sociale,pentru categoriile defavorizate;
text_en: Construction of social housing for disadvantaged groups;

text: Acordarea de credite cu dobânda subvenționată substanțial;
text_en: Granting loans at substantially subsidized interest rates;

text: Masuri pentru stimularea întreprinderilor mici si mijlocii:
text_en: Incentives for small and medium-sized enterprises:

text: Masuri pentru ameliorarea vieții pe plan local (orașe,sate ,comune):
text_en: Measures to improve life at the local level (cities, villages, municipalities):

text: relaxarea blocajului financiar,prin compensarea datoriei dintre agenții economici,prin reeșalonarea datoriilor la bugetul statului si la bugetul asigurărilor sociale pe o perioada de 5 ani,cu o perioada de gratie de 1 an;
text_en: easing the financial blockade, by compensating the debt between economic agents, by rearranging the debts to the state budget and to the social security budget for a period of 5 years, with a grace period of 1 year;

text: Principalele obiective ale strategiei PRM:- Integrarea demna a României in Uniunea Europeana;
text_en: The main objectives of the PRM strategy:- Dignity integration of Romania into the European Union;

text: Repartizarea de mașini agricole,rambursabile in produse agricole;
text_en: Distribution of agricultural machinery, refundable in agricultural products;

text: In pofida sondajelor de opinie,trucate in interesul unor forte obscure,PRM se bucură de o mare adeziune in rândul electoratului din toate păturile sociale.
text_en: Despite the polls conducted in the interests of obscure forces, PRM enjoys a large adherence among voters from all walks of life.

text: Povereniku za informacije od javnog značaja, kao i izvršna prava kojima se garantuje apsolutna dostupnost informacija i transparentnost rada svih državnih organa, organa Autonomne Pokrajine, organa lokalnih samouprava i javnih službi i preduzeća - PROGRAM POVERENIKG.
text_en: The Commissioner for Information of Public Importance, as well as the executive rights guaranteeing the absolute availability of information and the transparency of the work of all state bodies, bodies of the Autonomous Province, bodies of local self-government and public services and enterprises - PROGRAM POVERENIKG.

text: Razvoj seoskog turizma, kroz podsticaj proizvodnje zdrave hrane za goste, kvalitetnu ponudu i kroz udruživanje turističkih subjekata i povećanje saradnje s lokalnim institucijama u proširenju i obogaćivanju ponude - PROGRAM DECENTAR.
text_en: Development of rural tourism, through the stimulation of the production of healthy food for guests, quality offer and through the association of tourism entities and increasing cooperation with local institutions in the expansion and enrichment of the offer - PROGRAM DECENTAR.

text: ŠKOLSKI I OBRAZOVNI SISTEM
text_en: School and educational system

text: Podsticanje i promocija proizvodnje hrane bez pesticida, antibiotika i hormona.
text_en: Encourage and promote food production free of pesticides, antibiotics and hormones.

text: Uvođenje etike kao predmeta u srednjoškolsko obrazovanje i podsticanje učenika da vode argumentovane rasprave u cilju efikasnog razvoja mišljenja - PROGRAM ETIKA.14.
text_en: Introduction of ethics as a subject in secondary education and encouragement of students to conduct argumented discussions in order to develop effective thinking.

text_en: Natural Resources and Energy

text: Republike Srbije za vreme trajanja nezaposlenosti uz socijalna primanja, po broju izdržavanih članova domaćinstva republike, do pronalaženja posla - PROGRAM SOCMIN.
text_en: During the period of unemployment with social benefits, according to the number of members of the household of the Republic, until finding employment - SOCMIN PROGRAM.

text: Presude moraju biti u skladu sa zločinom koji je učinjen, a kaznena politika za prekršajna dela novčano represivna.
